With a silent flash, your new \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) becomes a perfect clone of your \$prop(this.trait:brief)!"
"set this.zcnt to 1 :: empty #zstuff in this :: fill #zstuff in this with other() :: set this.zmax to \$element(this,#zstuff,0)"
"empty #zstuff in this :: set this.zobj to nil :: set this.zcnt to nil :: set this.zmax to nil :: exit false"
"set this.usingskill to Jeweler :: set this.skillverb to adorn :: call bilbo:react:altersub"
"set this.usingskill to \$prop(this.trait:default-skill) :: set this.skillverb to \$prop(this.trait:default-skillverb) :: call bilbo:react:altersub"

"set this.tdesc to \$sam(\) :: set this.tcnt to 1 :: set this.tmax to \$element(this,#traits,0) :: if \$prop(this.tmax) = nil then goto 0020 else if \$prop(this.generic) = nil then goto 0020 else if \$prop(this.tmax) \> 0 then goto 0030"
"emit.actor Alas. \$capitalize(\$prop(this.tdesc)) is too old to submit to the skills of a \$prop(this.usingskill). Find a newer item to work upon. :: goto 0450"
"set this.ttemp to \$element(this,#traits,\$prop(this.tcnt)) :: set this.ttemp to this.trait:\$prop(this.ttemp):expert :: if \$prop(this.ttemp) = \$prop(this.usingskill) then goto 0060"
"emit.actor Alas. \$capitalize(\$prop(this.tdesc)) has no aspect that will submit to the skills of a \$prop(this.usingskill). :: goto 0450"
"set this.level to actor.skill:\$prop(this.usingskill) :: if \$prop(this.level) = nil then goto 0070 else if \$prop(this.level) \> 0 then goto 0080"
"emit.actor Alas, you have no skill as a \$prop(this.usingskill) yet. Seek a teacher. :: goto 0450"

"set this.zrank to \$lookup(Generic:DB:DataDB) :: set this.zrank to \$element(this.zrank,#grade,\$prop(this.level)) :: set this.skillname to \$sam(\) :: set this.skillname to \$prop(this.skillname) \$prop(this.usingskill) :: if \$evoke0 \> 0 then goto 0150"
"set this.tcnt to 1 :: set this.tmax to \$element(this,#traits,0) :: emit.actor As \$prop(this.skillname), you have enough skill to perform the following alterations upon \$prop(this.tdesc):"

"set this.tname to \$element(this,#traits,\$prop(this.tcnt)) :: set this.ttemp to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname):expert :: set this.zdata to \$capitalize(\$prop(this.tname)) :: set this.zdata to Generic:DB:Skill\$prop(this.zdata)DB :: set this.zdata to \$lookup(\$prop(this.zdata)) :: if \$prop(this.zdata) = nil then goto 0180 else if \$prop(this.ttemp) \<\> \$prop(this.usingskill) then goto 0130 else call bilbo:react:listsub"
"add 1 to this.tcnt :: if \$prop(this.tcnt) \<= \$prop(this.tmax) then goto 0110 else call bilbo:react:howsub"
"set this.tname to \$lowercase(\$evoke1) :: set this.ttemp to \$find(this,#traits,\$prop(this.tname)) :: if \$prop(this.ttemp) = nil then goto 0180"

"set this.zdata to \$capitalize(\$prop(this.tname)) :: set this.zdata to Generic:DB:Skill\$prop(this.zdata)DB :: set this.zdata to \$lookup(\$prop(this.zdata)) :: if \$prop(this.zdata) \<\> nil then goto 0190"

"emit.actor Alas. The \\"\$prop(this.tname)\\" of \$prop(this.tdesc) cannot be altered.\
\
For a list of alterable traits, use the syntax: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) :: goto 0450"
"set this.ttemp to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname):expert :: if \$prop(this.ttemp) = \$prop(this.usingskill) then goto 0210"
"emit.actor Alas. You cannot use your \$prop(this.usingskill) skill to alter the \$prop(this.tname) of \$prop(this.tdesc). Seek a \$prop(this.ttemp). :: goto 0450"

"emit.actor As \$prop(this.skillname), you have the skill to perform \$prop(this.tally) \$prop(this.tname) alterations upon \$prop(this.tdesc): \$prop(this.tline).\
\
The current \$prop(this.tname) is [\$prop(this.tnow)]. :: call bilbo:react:howsub"
"set this.oname to \$lowercase(\$evoke2) :: set this.tlevel to \$element(this.zdata,#exp,\$prop(this.oname)) :: if \$prop(this.tlevel) \<\> nil then goto 0270"

"emit.actor Alas. You cannot alter the \$prop(this.tname) of \$prop(this.tdesc) to \\"\$prop(this.oname)\\".\
\
To see a list of alterable traits, use the command: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$brief(this) :: goto 0450"

"emit.actor Alas. As \$prop(this.skillname), you don't yet have enough skill to alter the \$prop(this.tname) of \$prop(this.tdesc) to \\"\$prop(this.oname)\\".\
\
To see a list of the alterations available to a \$prop(this.usingskill) with your experience, use the command: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$brief(this) :: goto 0450"
"set this.tnow to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname) :: if \$prop(this.tnow) \<\> \$prop(this.oname) then goto 0310"
"emit.actor The \$prop(this.tname) of \$prop(this.tdesc) is already set to \\"\$prop(this.oname)\\". :: goto 0450"
"if \$prop(this.tnow) = none then goto 0330 else if \$prop(this.level) \>= 8 then goto 0330"
"emit.actor Alas. The \$prop(this.tname) of \$prop(this.tdesc) has already been altered to \$prop(this.tnow); only a Master \$prop(this.usingskill) can alter it again. :: goto 0450"

"emit.actor Employing your skill as \$prop(this.skillname), you alter the \$prop(this.tname) of \$prop(this.tdesc) to \\"\$prop(this.oname)\\". :: emit.audience \$brief(actor) employs \ skill as \$prop(this.skillname), altering the \$prop(this.tname) of \ \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) to \\"\$prop(this.oname)\\". :: set this.tdetail to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname):detail :: if \$prop(this.tdetail) = nil then set this.tdetail to default"

"set this.trait:\$prop(this.tname) to \$prop(this.oname) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.trait:editor to \$brief(actor) [\$date] :: if \$prop(this.tname) \<\> symbol then goto 0390"
"set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.oname) = none then goto 0380"
"set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: goto 0390"
"set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\)"
"if \$prop(actor.storyhost) \<\> nil then goto 0410 else if \$prop(this.tlevel) \< 4 then goto 0410 else if \$prop(this.trait:mastermark) \<\> nil then goto 0410"

"set this.trait:mastermark to \$prop(this.zrank) \$prop(this.usingskill) \$brief(actor) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: set this.ttemp to \$sam(\) :: emit.actor \
With a \{final\|proud\|grand\} \{stroke\|gesture\|flourish\}, you apply your professional Mark to \$prop(this.tdesc). :: emit.audience \
With a \{final\|proud\|grand\} \{stroke\|gesture\|flourish\}, \$brief(actor) applies \ professional Mark to \$prop(this.tdesc)."

"if \$prop(this.tname) = color then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) = material then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) = metal then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) = wood then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) \<\> stone then goto 0430"
"set this.usingskill to Carpenter :: set this.skillverb to build :: call bilbo:react:altersub"
"set this.usingskill to Carver :: set this.skillverb to carve :: call bilbo:react:altersub"
"set this.xskill to Engraver :: set this.xlevel to 7 :: if \$prop(actor.skill:engraver) = nil then set this.zslevel to 0 else set this.zslevel to \$prop(actor.skill:engraver)"
"set this.usingskill to Stainer :: set this.skillverb to stain :: call bilbo:react:altersub"
"set this.usingskill to Tailor :: set this.skillverb to tailor :: call bilbo:react:altersub"

With a \{final\|proud\|grand\} \{stroke\|gesture\|flourish\}, \$brief(actor) applies \ professional Mark to \$prop(this.tdesc)."

"if \$prop(this.tname) = color then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) = material then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) = metal then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) = wood then goto 0420 else if \$prop(this.tname) \<\> stone then goto 0430"

Last edited by: \$prop(this.trait:editor)"

"emit.actor \
To \$lowercase(\$prop(this.skillverb)) this item, use the syntax: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"[trait] [value]\\". (Don't forget the quotes!) Example: \$prop(this.skillverb) \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"\$prop(this.xtrait) \$prop(this.xvalue)\\""
"set this.xskill to Engraver :: set this.xlevel to 7 :: if \$prop(actor.skill:engraver) = nil then set this.zslevel to 0 else set this.zslevel to \$prop(actor.skill:engraver)"
"set this.tdesc to \$sam(\) :: if \$prop(this.generic) = nil then goto 0040 :: if \$prop(this.trait:symbol:expert) = \$prop(this.xskill) then goto 0050"

"emit.actor [You must specify the message to be inscribed in quotes. Example: inscribe \$prop(this.trait:superbrief) \\"I Love You!\\"] :: goto 0140"
"if \$evokefull = none then goto 0120 else if \$evokefull = None then goto 0120 else if \$evokefull = NONE then goto 0120"

"set this.ttemp to nil :: set this.tdesc to nil :: exit false"

"set this.tally to 0 :: set this.itemcnt to 1 :: set this.tline to \$sam(\) :: set this.tnow to this.trait:\$prop(this.tname) :: set this.xtrait to \$prop(this.tname) :: set this.xvalue to \$obj(this.zdata).example1 :: if \$prop(this.xvalue) = \$prop(this.tnow) then set this.xvalue to \$obj(this.zdata).example2"

"emit.actor [Exactly 3 parameters required: trait value difficulty] :: goto 0200"

"set this.ztemp to \$element(this.zdata,#exp,\$evoke2) :: if \$prop(this.ztemp) = nil then goto 0110"
"if \$evoke3 \< 1 then goto 0120 else if \$evoke3 \< 11 then goto 0130"

"add 1 to this.zcnt :: set \$obj(this.zdata).#\$evoke1[0] to \$prop(this.zcnt) :: set \$obj(this.zdata).#\$evoke1[\$prop(this.zcnt)] to \$evoke2"
"set this.ztemp to \$obj(this.zdata).#cnt\$evoke1[\$evoke3] :: add 1 to this.ztemp :: set \$obj(this.zdata).#cnt\$evoke1[\$evoke3] to \$prop(this.ztemp)"
